## Project Goals

* Leverage existing open source documents
* Understand the limitations of data within ArcGIS Pro
* Understand the limitations of data within open-source platforms
* Track known issues and behaviors for commnunity involvement

### Stakeholder Benefits

### Overview
![Matrix Image](kleb-project/images/overview.png)
Image Service Compatibility Matrix. Scores are based on a subset of NASA Earthdata image services (n=21) that were fully or partially compliant in compatibility areas. Sources include EGIS and non-EGIS image services. Out Of The Box is abridged to OOTB.
